title: Jane's Library (Front-End)
description: An Online Blog website containing blog content from Poet, Singer-Songwriter & Author Jane Goodall. This website contains an interface for a blog, an online library storage & an Open-library API book search feature. The website posted here is a sample.

title: AutoInsure - Car Insurance & Rental Website (Full-Stack)
description: A car insurance/rental website that allows users to predict insurance quotes for specific cars, & rent cars for business or personal use. This website provides an interface for searching, comparing & reserving cars.

title: E-Commerce Website (Pending)
description: An E-commerce store that prioritises user experience, to help users locate & purchase the products they need online.
